WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

We are closing this working as this is not strictly related to Prism, and might be related to particular System limitations, and in some cases will depend on the installation path.
Also for those interested you can find more information about this in the following article from MSDN: Maximum Path Length Limitation (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa365247(v=vs.85).aspx#maxpath)

Thanks,

﻿Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami﻿
WorkItem.Description: Reduce the length of the file names and the depth of the folder structure to avoid the limitation of 255 characters in a file path.
WorkItem.Summary: Reduce filename length to avoid metadata file not found bug
